Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the danger President Trump is in by stating that he is being deliberately killed at Walter Reed Military Hospital without providing any evidence to support this claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to back up the allegation that President Trump is being deliberately killed.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the experimental drugs being given to President Trump are dangerous and that the doctors at Walter Reed Medical Facility are either trying to kill him or are incredibly inept, without providing any evidence to support these assumptions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the treatment President Trump is receiving, such as the fact that he is being treated aggressively for COVID-19 and that the drugs and vitamins he is taking are part of his medical care plan.
